KitaMatch

Classes

Applicant
This model handles applicants
Code
This model handles the (status-)codes
Kernel
Criterium
This model handles selection criteria for the preference order of coordinated programs
Guardian
This model handles guardians
AdminController
This controller handles the administration side. It creates the admin dashboard and routes to various tasks.
ApplicantController
This controller handles applicants: the creation of new applicants, update of existing ones, as well as status changes (e.g. priority matching).
ForgotPasswordController
This controller is responsible for handling password reset emails and includes a trait which assists in sending these notifications from your application to your users.
LoginController
This controller handles authenticating users for the application and redirecting them to the home screen.
RegisterController
This controller handles the registration of new users as well as their validation and creation.
ResetPasswordController
This controller is responsible for handling password reset requests and uses a simple trait to include this behavior.
Controller
CriteriumController
This controller handles the criteria catalogue: creation, update.
GuardianController
This controller handles guardians: the creation of new and update of existing ones, as well as status changes (e.g. validation).
HomeController
This controller is responsible for the home site, mainly redirecting to different account types.
MatchingController
This controller is responsible for the matching process: preperation, call and handling of the Matchingtools API.
PreferenceController
This controller handles the preferences of applicants & programs: add/edit, arrange preferences, distinguish betwenn coordinated & uncoordinated programs.
ProgramController
This controller handles programs: the creation of new and update of existing ones, status changes and activity check for uncoordinated.
ProviderController
This controller handles programs: the creation of new programs and update of existing ones, status changes and activity check for uncoordinated programs.

MatchRequest
This class handles the requests of matches
ProgramRequest
This class handles the requests of programs
ProviderRequest
This class handles the requests of provider
ReCaptchataRequest
This class handles the requests of the ReCapatcha
UpdateGuardianRequest
This class handles the update request of guardians
ApplicantMatchMail
This mail class handles with a successfull applicant match.
GuardianVerifiedMail
This mail class handles with the event of a successfull verification of a guardian and his applicants.
ProgramMatchMail
This mail class handles with a successfull program match.

This model handles matches
Preference
This model handles the preferences of programs and applicants
